head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials WARDEN, ALICE HEARD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials WARDEN, ALICE HEARD

block.p: WARDEN-Alice Heard. passed away suddenly but peacefully on September 2, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Dr. David E. Warden, mother of Alice Guida and David Todd Warden II, grandmother of Amanda Guida and Katherine and David Todd Warden III. A memorial service will be held Saturday, November 4 at 1:30PM at St. John's Episcopal Church, Cold Spring Harbor, LI, NY
